ip1:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
mul R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op1:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000



ip4:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
div R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op4:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1011100011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip5:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
xor R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op5:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1101000011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip6:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
or R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op6:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1101100011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip7:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
and R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op7:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1110000011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000
